reviewText: Gotta have in your Bama collection
This is a Christmas present but I know it will be great
Really enjoyed this documentation. Roll Tide!

The most succinct and excellent documentary on the greatest coach ever.  Every minute is packed with old game video, new interviews with its players and what made Bear Bryant the man and the coach he became.  Outstanding.
Great program; was so lucky to get this for my mom (what a huge Bear Bryant fan); she loves it!
Enjoyed it.  an avid Alabama fan - I am interested in Coach Bryant and his life.
Great dvd for any fan of Coach Bryant. Very well done.
Highly recommended for Alabama fans. Has the famous AT&T reach out and touch someone ad with the most effective line in any tv ad, "Call your momma today. I sure wish i could call mine."
